Job Title:
SAVANT DEGREES PTE LTD visibility public
- job post
Job Description:
We help companies innovate
We believe digital transformation is a vehicle for creating and unlocking new value. At Savant Degrees, we have what it takes to help you stay ahead by designing innovative digital products that are strategically aligned to your business goals.
We offer both custom and turnkey solutions
With many years of consulting experience with the best industry leaders, we have gathered invaluable digital solution insights; and created various ready to use back-end platforms and frameworks that are customizable to every business need. Our extensive experience enables us to offer our clients fast turnaround time and fast prototyping service.
Embark on your Digital Transformation Journey
Savant Degrees helps you unleash your exponential growth through digital transformation. Rapidly build prototypes to test out your best ideas through our Innovation Acceleration Lab; cultivate a culture of innovation through our Digital Learning Program; or engage our SWAT Team and access Savant Degrees’ key resources, advisors and partner network.
The Savant Method™
The Savant Method™ of design thinking has been successfully applied to creating impactful digital solutions for our partners across the world. Have the next big idea? Our passionate team of designers, UX experts, developers and technical architects are here to turn them into reality.
Software development is a requirement but beyond it, you are part of a team that will be

Ideating and Designing Solutions – work with our clients and other stake-holders to design user-driven digital solutions. This can include activities such as: - Defining product objectives by analyzing user requirements; and envisioning system features and functionality. - Conducting a technical feasibility study by recommending system solutions by comparing the advantages and disadvantages of custom development vs purchase alternatives. - Designing the technical architecture and project management plans to gear up for implementation and deployment

Developing Solutions – Work to deliver quality code on time, on target, and within budget. This will include activities such as: Developing Solutions – Work to deliver quality code on time, on target, and within budget. This will include activities such as: - Database design and development - Support and accelerate application development - Web development using modern MVC frameworks - Architect API and use of 3rd party API

Building Up Best Practices – Document engineering processes and contribute to the technology stack. This will include activities such as: - Writing quality documentation and assistance tools to support users in the long term. - Working with peer developers to review the technical implementation of projects and identify areas of improvement. - Conduct R&D on latest technologies or trends.

Supporting Mission Critical Systems - Working with the team to provide support to client systems. This can include activities such as: -Developing APM and other telemetry to monitor system - Providing support to client and team to ensure proper functioning of system - Bug fixes and pro-active code management
You are the right fit if

You are a team player

You are curious and ask the right questions

You dream of applying new technologies and trends into a tangible product

You are ultimately passionate about delivering solutions that creates real value for its users

Requirements:
Minimum 4 years of current, hands-on experience in Java software and/or web development.

A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or a proven autodidact programmer

1~2 years experience in DevOpsSec and setting up of enterprise cloud infrastructure on AWS, Azure or GCP

Experience in using a Java MVC web framework (i.e. SpringBoot)

Experience in Vue.js or equivalent would be an advantage

Mobile development experience is a bonus

Living in Indonesia

Fluent in both English and Bahasa Indonesia

With many years of consulting experience with the best industry leaders, we have gathered invaluable digital solution insights; and created various ready to use back-end platforms and frameworks that are customizable to every business need. Our extensive experience enables us to offer our clients fast turnaround time and fast prototyping service.
Embark on your Digital Transformation Journey
Savant Degrees helps you unleash your exponential growth through digital transformation. Rapidly build prototypes to test out your best ideas through our Innovation Acceleration Lab; cultivate a culture of innovation through our Digital Learning Program; or engage our SWAT Team and access Savant Degrees’ key resources, advisors and partner network.
The Savant Method™
The Savant Method™ of design thinking has been successfully applied to creating impactful digital solutions for our partners across the world. Have the next big idea? Our passionate team of designers, UX experts, developers and technical architects are here to turn them into reality.
Software development is a requirement but beyond it, you are part of a team that will be

Ideating and Designing Solutions – work with our clients and other stake-holders to design user-driven digital solutions. This can include activities such as: - Defining product objectives by analyzing user requirements; and envisioning system features and functionality. - Conducting a technical feasibility study by recommending system solutions by comparing the advantages and disadvantages of custom development vs purchase alternatives. - Designing the technical architecture and project management plans to gear up for implementation and deployment

Developing Solutions – Work to deliver quality code on time, on target, and within budget. This will include activities such as: Developing Solutions – Work to deliver quality code on time, on target, and within budget. This will include activities such as: - Database design and development - Support and accelerate application development - Web development using modern MVC frameworks - Architect API and use of 3rd party API

Building Up Best Practices – Document engineering processes and contribute to the technology stack. This will include activities such as: - Writing quality documentation and assistance tools to support users in the long term. - Working with peer developers to review the technical implementation of projects and identify areas of improvement. - Conduct R&D on latest technologies or trends.

Supporting Mission Critical Systems - Working with the team to provide support to client systems. This can include activities such as: -Developing APM and other telemetry to monitor system - Providing support to client and team to ensure proper functioning of system - Bug fixes and pro-active code management
You are the right fit if

You are a team player

You are curious and ask the right questions

You dream of applying new technologies and trends into a tangible product

You are ultimately passionate about delivering solutions that creates real value for its users

Requirements:
Minimum 4 years of current, hands-on experience in Java software and/or web development.

A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or a proven autodidact programmer

1~2 years experience in DevOpsSec and setting up of enterprise cloud infrastructure on AWS, Azure or GCP

Experience in using a Java MVC web framework (i.e. SpringBoot)

Experience in Vue.js or equivalent would be an advantage

Mobile development experience is a bonus

Living in Indonesia

Fluent in both English and Bahasa Indonesia

Job Title:
Business Development Manager - Bali
- job post
Job Description:
About Lamudi
Our mission is to provide any Indonesian the most trustworthy and reliable way to buy a property. We do this by using technology to empower 10,000+ real estate agents and 100's property developers by connecting them to millions of prospective buyers previously beyond their reach. Lamudi.co.id is a property technology company that aims to enable and support all parties along the property seeking, buying, and selling process from our range of products and services.

About the challenge
Are you a strategic thinker with a knack for building and nurturing client relationships?
Do you have a passion for driving business growth and managing high-performance teams?
Are you excited about the opportunity to work in Bali, engaging with international clients and property developers?
If yes, roll up your sleeves because we have an interesting position for you!

We are looking for an experienced and highly motivated Business Development Manager to join our team in Bali. This role will serve as the face of Lamudi in Bali for international clients, including real estate agencies and property developers. We welcome applications from candidates around the globe.

As a Business Development Manager you will create good relationships with team members and motivate them to put in their best to work in order to achieve maximum results. You will create a strong commitment to drive our telesales performance and maintain a “can do” attitude, seek solutions to problems and work toward improvement continuously.

What your day-to-day will look like:
You will serve as the primary point of contact for international clients in Bali, ensuring their needs are met and fostering strong relationships.
You will collaborate with the country senior management team to enhance and roll out new business models and operations in Bali.
You will build and manage a high-performance sales team, driving them to achieve and exceed targets.
You will develop and implement strategies to expand our market presence and drive business growth in Bali.
You will build connections with property offices on a daily basis
Is this you?
A captain: someone who knows how to run a tight ship, with a high sense of responsibility and commitment
A commercial mind: Someone who loves providing customer service whilst always on the lookout for the opportunity to up sell our product/service
Excellent Sales & Negotiation skills: Knows the sales game by heart and loves to play it everyday, understands what makes a customer tick and can get always get a deal that makes all parties happy
A client success mindset: Demonstrates outstanding account management skills and an understanding of the needs of international clients.
A strategic thinker: Capable of developing and implementing effective business strategies.
Graduated from a top global university, with a degree in business, engineering, or a related field
A good command of the English language
Have experience in direct selling, relationship management, or meeting customers in any other way
Have entrepreneurship experience and a proven track record in meeting own targets & deadlines
Have a willingness to work in a fast-paced environment, and able to work under pressure and with monthly target
This position is open to foreign applicants, preferably someone with prior experience living and/or working in South-East Asia, although it is not strictly required.
Our selection procedure in a nutshell
The position reports to the VP Direct Sales. During the interview process, you will meet him/her, as well as a few business stakeholders and Management Team members.

If you want to become a part of our highly motivated, international team, please click on the 'Apply Now' button to send us your application! We are looking forward to hearing from you!

Lamudi.co.id is a property technology company that aims to enable and support all parties along the property seeking, buying, and selling process from our range of products and services.

About the challenge
Are you a strategic thinker with a knack for building and nurturing client relationships?
Do you have a passion for driving business growth and managing high-performance teams?
Are you excited about the opportunity to work in Bali, engaging with international clients and property developers?
If yes, roll up your sleeves because we have an interesting position for you!

We are looking for an experienced and highly motivated Business Development Manager to join our team in Bali. This role will serve as the face of Lamudi in Bali for international clients, including real estate agencies and property developers. We welcome applications from candidates around the globe.

As a Business Development Manager you will create good relationships with team members and motivate them to put in their best to work in order to achieve maximum results. You will create a strong commitment to drive our telesales performance and maintain a “can do” attitude, seek solutions to problems and work toward improvement continuously.

What your day-to-day will look like:
You will serve as the primary point of contact for international clients in Bali, ensuring their needs are met and fostering strong relationships.
You will collaborate with the country senior management team to enhance and roll out new business models and operations in Bali.
You will build and manage a high-performance sales team, driving them to achieve and exceed targets.
You will develop and implement strategies to expand our market presence and drive business growth in Bali.
You will build connections with property offices on a daily basis
Is this you?
A captain: someone who knows how to run a tight ship, with a high sense of responsibility and commitment
A commercial mind: Someone who loves providing customer service whilst always on the lookout for the opportunity to up sell our product/service
Excellent Sales & Negotiation skills: Knows the sales game by heart and loves to play it everyday, understands what makes a customer tick and can get always get a deal that makes all parties happy
A client success mindset: Demonstrates outstanding account management skills and an understanding of the needs of international clients.
A strategic thinker: Capable of developing and implementing effective business strategies.
Graduated from a top global university, with a degree in business, engineering, or a related field
A good command of the English language
Have experience in direct selling, relationship management, or meeting customers in any other way
Have entrepreneurship experience and a proven track record in meeting own targets & deadlines
Have a willingness to work in a fast-paced environment, and able to work under pressure and with monthly target
This position is open to foreign applicants, preferably someone with prior experience living and/or working in South-East Asia, although it is not strictly required.
Our selection procedure in a nutshell
The position reports to the VP Direct Sales. During the interview process, you will meet him/her, as well as a few business stakeholders and Management Team members.

If you want to become a part of our highly motivated, international team, please click on the 'Apply Now' button to send us your application! We are looking forward to hearing from you!
